description: WFerrero Servicios Inmobiliarios Sells fantastic single-family home, located in one of the best areas of Leganes. Located just 10 minutes from Madrid. The house has an area of 237 m2. distributed over four floors. Ground floor: We enter the house and find a large hall from which, on the right, we access a large, brightly furnished and equipped designer kitchen. On the left, a toilet, and access to the basement area and in front, the independent living room with several rooms from which you have access to the garden of about 60 m2. The paved garden has fantastic planters, trees, and a barbecue. We went up to the first floor, of which it is worth highlighting the access for people with reduced mobility with the installation of a perfectly functioning lift chair. On the first floor there are four bedrooms, with built-in wardrobes and two completely renovated bathrooms, one of them en suite. suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Casco Antiguo, Leganés', 'title': 'Flat in Calle San Nicasio'}
description: 1 bedroom apartment with 52 meters without elevator, very bright, a few meters from the Carlos III University. Excellent location, with all services nearby. Five minutes from central Leganés commuter train. Call us and find out without obligation. Leganés is a municipality and a Spanish city that is part of the Community of Madrid. It is located within the metropolitan area of Madrid and is located eleven kilometers southwest of the capital. It is located on a plain in the Central Plateau of the Iberian Peninsula, crossed by the Butarque stream, a tributary of the Manzanares River. It limits to the north with the Madrid districts of Carabanchel and La Latina, to the west with Alcorcón, to the east with Getafe and the district of Villaverde, and to the south with Fuenlabrada. Founded in 1280 as Legamar during the reign of Alfonso X el Sabio, years later it adopted the current place name, and in 1345 it was incorporated as a village in the district of Madrid. 2 In 1627 it became a manor town when King Felipe IV created the Marquesate of Leganés, and it remained as such until the feudal privileges were abolished in 1820.

The apartment is distributed in an entrance hall, a fully equipped kitchen, a large living room, three bedrooms, and a full bathroom. At HOGARES, A NEW CONCEPT OF REAL ESTATE, we offer you financing up to 100% with our own financial department (FINANHOGAR). Don't think twice and contact us to visit it!

description: HOGARES LEGANES offers this spacious semi-detached house located in one of the best areas of the municipality. It is located just 20 minutes from Madrid, with quick access to M-40, and less than 5 minutes from the ParqueSur Shopping Center. It is located close to essential services such as train, pharmacies, supermarkets, schools.. . The property is part of a community of owners with common areas. It has an urbanization with swimming pool and playground. The house is distributed over four floors as follows: On the FIRST FLOOR we find the hall, a bright fully equipped kitchen with a clothesline, a BEDROOM ON THE FLOOR and a FULL BATHROOM. In addition, here is the wonderful living room with direct access to the private plot with pergola and built-in barbecue. From the garden you have direct access to the beautiful common areas. The SECOND FLOOR houses FOUR bedrooms. Three of them are doubles, and two have a private terrace, as well as a full bathroom to service them. The master bedroom has a full en-suite bathroom. On the top floor is the ATTIC, completely open plan and with large windows and wooden ceilings, perfect to adapt to your needs. It also has water and drainage inlets for a future bathroom. On the BASEMENT floor we have a garage for 3 cars, bathroom, wine cellar with bar and laundry. You can also access the plot directly from here. This space is fantastic for celebrations! Don't miss this unique opportunity to acquire your new home in Leganés! DO NOT HESITATE TO REQUEST YOUR VISIT, BETTER SEE! Consult our financial department for 100% FINANCING!
